  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content
       original-tweet js-original-tweet
      
      
       
" data-tweet-id="282500745692061698" data-item-id="282500745692061698" data-permalink-path="/Qaphui/status/282500745692061698" data-conversation-id="282500745692061698" data-tweet-nonce="282500745692061698-cef5e978-d458-4bb8-826f-be0e8cdab515" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="Qaphui" data-name="Kafui" data-user-id="45875886" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;45875886&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;Qaphui&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Kafui&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Kafui&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Kafui&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-component-context="tweet">

    <div class="context">
      
      
    </div>

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="https://twitter.com/Qaphui" data-user-id="45875886">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="./makerfaire_2012_files/z8UJNRW3_bigger.jpg" alt="">
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Kafui</strong><span>‏</span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak">&nbsp;</span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>Qaphui</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">
  <a href="https://twitter.com/Qaphui/status/282500745692061698" class="tweet-timestamp js-permalink js-nav js-tooltip" title="7:00 AM - 22 Dec 2012" data-conversation-id="282500745692061698"><span class="_timestamp js-short-timestamp " data-aria-label-part="last" data-time="1356188401" data-time-ms="1356188401000" data-long-form="true">22 Dec 2012</span></a>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

  <p class="TweetTextSize  js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">If you saw my <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/3dprinting?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>3dprinting</b></a> on paper at <a href="https://twitter.com/makerfaire" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1578141"><s>@</s><b><strong>MakerFaire</strong></b></a> NYC and were curious, here's my <a href="https://twitter.com/instructables" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="7597362"><s>@</s><b>instructables</b></a> showing how: <a href="http://t.co/IQ20yXWl" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.instructables.com/id/3D-Printing-PLA-on-Tissue-Paper/" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.instructables.com/id/3D-Printing-PLA-on-Tissue-Paper/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">instructables.com/id/3D-Printing</span><span class="invisible">-PLA-on-Tissue-Paper/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span>…</span></a></p>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-action--retweet u-hiddenVisually">
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="3">

  </div>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize  js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">RT <a href="https://twitter.com/dgelman" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="17883159"><s>@</s><b>dgelman</b></a>: RT <a href="https://twitter.com/Sifteo" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20261450"><s>@</s><b>Sifteo</b></a>: After <a href="https://twitter.com/makerfaire" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1578141"><s>@</s><b><strong>MakerFaire</strong></b></a>, we're reminded of "Tinkerers Unite! How <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/Parents?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Parents</b></a> Enable Kids' <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/Creativity?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Creativity</b></a>" <a href="http://t.co/67rU2RIc" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://on.wsj.com/LdEOfz" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://on.wsj.com/LdEOfz"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">on.wsj.com/LdEOfz</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize  js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Mentos and Coke explosion. </div>


    

    

  </div>

</div>
  



      
      

      

      

    </div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content
       original-tweet js-original-tweet
      
      
       has-cards cards-forward
" data-tweet-id="250573114189152256" data-item-id="250573114189152256" data-permalink-path="/make/status/250573114189152256" data-conversation-id="250573114189152256" data-tweet-nonce="250573114189152256-2ccef06f-0e0b-440b-98bb-845f0dcf0e58" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="make" data-name="Make:" data-user-id="1118451" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="MakerShed" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;1118451&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;make&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Make:&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Make:&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Make:&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;24923100&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;MakerShed&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Maker Shed&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Maker Shed&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Maker Shed&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary" data-has-cards="true" data-component-context="tweet">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="https://twitter.com/make" data-user-id="1118451">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="./makerfaire_2012_files/LESsgngz_bigger.jpg" alt="">
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Make:</strong><span>‏</span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak">&nbsp;</span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>make</b></span></a>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="https://twitter.com/SketchUp" data-user-id="16950889">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="./makerfaire_2012_files/RGAR17ex_bigger.jpg" alt="">
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content

" data-tweet-id="238712473363046400" data-item-id="238712473363046400" data-permalink-path="/LaughingSquid/status/238712473363046400" data-conversation-id="238712473363046400" data-tweet-nonce="238712473363046400-40cf79e0-4fab-4e1d-be9a-cb100d8ef1df" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="LaughingSquid" data-name="Laughing Squid" data-user-id="2172" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="makerfaire nysci" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2172&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;LaughingSquid&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Laughing Squid&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Laughing Squid&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Laughing Squid&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;1578141&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;makerfaire&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Maker Faire&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Maker Faire&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Maker Faire&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;20081176&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;nysci&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;New York Hall of Science&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;New York Hall of Science&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;New York Hall of Science&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true" data-component-context="tweet">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="https://twitter.com/LaughingSquid" data-user-id="2172">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="./makerfaire_2012_files/cITQxL4m_bigger.jpg" alt="">
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Laughing Squid</strong><span>‏</span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak">&nbsp;</span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>LaughingSquid</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">
  <a href="https://twitter.com/LaughingSquid/status/238712473363046400" class="tweet-timestamp js-permalink js-nav js-tooltip" title="12:01 PM - 23 Aug 2012" data-conversation-id="238712473363046400"><span class="_timestamp js-short-timestamp " data-aria-label-part="last" data-time="1345748463" data-time-ms="1345748463000" data-long-form="true">23 Aug 2012</span></a>
</small>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-226031655972925440">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content

" data-tweet-id="217346881460764672" data-item-id="217346881460764672" data-permalink-path="/hackaday/status/217346881460764672" data-conversation-id="217346881460764672" data-tweet-nonce="217346881460764672-16252b68-fb9e-4464-86f4-dfab48483435" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="hackaday" data-name="hackaday" data-user-id="14607140" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;14607140&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;hackaday&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;hackaday&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;hackaday&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;hackaday&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-component-context="tweet">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="https://twitter.com/hackaday" data-user-id="14607140">

  <p class="TweetTextSize  js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Celebrate <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/GeekDadDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GeekDadDay</b></a> w/ our favorite Geek Dad <a href="https://twitter.com/donttrythis" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="15661871"><s>@</s><b>donttrythis</b></a>.   <p class="TweetTextSize  js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">On <a href="https://twitter.com/Wired_Design" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="524561832"><s>@</s><b>wired_design</b></a> community: We visit with <a href="https://twitter.com/SFCB" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="67675423"><s>@</s><b>SFCB</b></a> at <a href="https://twitter.com/makerfaire" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1578141"><s>@</s><b><strong>makerfaire</strong></b></a>, make a notebook &amp; share online bookmaking resources: <a href="http://t.co/QxuWucZs" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://design.hotwired.com/profiles/blogs/how-to-letterpress-and-bookbind-your-own-book" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://design.hotwired.com/profiles/blogs/how-to-letterpress-and-bookbind-your-own-book"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">design.hotwired.com/profiles/blogs</span><span class="invisible">/how-to-letterpress-and-bookbind-your-own-book</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span>…</span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize  js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today is your last chance to enter to WIN a PC DIY Starter Kit from ASUS and <a href="https://twitter.com/CorsairMemory" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3044740947"><s>@</s><b>CorsairMemory</b></a> worth $1,035! <a href="http://t.co/xuxqC2f5" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://goo.gl/ounge" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://goo.gl/ounge"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">goo.gl/ounge</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a> <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/MakerFaire?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b><strong>MakerFaire</strong></b></a></p>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize  js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Got my pic taken with <a href="https://twitter.com/Steenaire" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="133915276"><s>@</s><b>Steenaire</b></a> at <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/makerfaire?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b><strong>makerfaire</strong></b></a>. Barely managed to spell out "BOOB" on a calculator before the flash <a href="http://t.co/CHLoHjtQ" class="twitter-timeline-link" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/CHLoHjtQ</a></p>
</div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="https://twitter.com/makerbot" data-user-id="22021097">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="./makerfaire_2012_files/9XyyKdC6_bigger.jpeg" alt="">

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize  js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Can makers change the world?   <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize  js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">In the Boston area with the day off? Head over to the Cambridge Mini-<strong>MakerFaire</strong> <a href="http://t.co/9yWGOJKN" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/HW1aS1" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/HW1aS1"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/HW1aS1</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a> Organized by <a href="https://twitter.com/connors934" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="10266"><s>@</s><b>connors934</b></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize  js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The a-maze-ment increases at the Melbourne <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/makerfaire?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b><strong>makerfaire</strong></b></a> <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/mfm2012?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>mfm2012</b></a><a href="http://t.co/jA2wsqy3" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/jA2wsqy3</a></p>

<div id="goto-user-dialog" class="modal-container">
  <div class="modal modal-small draggable">
    <div class="modal-content">
      <button type="button" class="modal-btn modal-close js-close">
  <span class="Icon Icon--close Icon--medium">
    <span class="visuallyhidden">Close</span>
  </span>
</button>


      <div class="modal-header">
        <h3 class="modal-title">Go to a person's profile</h3>
      </div>

      <div class="modal-body">
        <div class="modal-inner">
          <form class="t1-form goto-user-form">
            <input class="input-block username-input" type="text" placeholder="Start typing a name to jump to a profile" aria-label="User" aria-autocomplete="list" aria-expanded="false" aria-owns="typeahead-dropdown-4">
            


<div role="listbox" class="dropdown-menu typeahead" id="typeahead-dropdown-4">
  <div aria-hidden="true" class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <div role="presentation" class="dropdown-inner js-typeahead-results"><ul role="presentation" class="typeahead-items typeahead-accounts social-context js-typeahead-accounts block0" style="display: none;">
  
  <li role="presentation" data-user-id="" data-user-screenname="" data-remote="true" data-score="" class="typeahead-item typeahead-account-item js-selectable">
    
    <a role="option" class="js-nav" data-query-source="typeahead_click" data-search-query="" data-ds="account">
      <div class="js-selectable typeahead-in-conversation hidden">
        <span class="Icon Icon--follower Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="typeahead-in-conversation-text">In this conversation</span>
      </div>
      <img class="avatar size32" alt="">
      <span class="typeahead-user-item-info account-group">
        <span class="fullname"></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified js-verified hidden"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span><span class="Icon Icon--protected js-protected hidden"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Protected Tweets</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b></b></span>

    </a>

  <li role="presentation" class="js-selectable typeahead-accounts-shortcut js-shortcut"><a role="option" class="js-nav" href="https://twitter.com/search?l=en&amp;q=makerfaire%20since%3A2012-01-01%20until%3A2012-12-31&amp;src=typd&amp;lang=en" data-search-query="" data-query-source="typeahead_click" data-shortcut="true" data-ds="account_search"></a></li>

  </p>
</div>

  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--follow UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
